name: Samudai
description: Stand your ground against your friends and push them to their limit in this local multiplayer fighter! Slash, dash and claw your way to victory defeating them throughout Mount Samudai and face off against their Ultimate Boss Mode!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 6600 CPU Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT 512 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7 and higher Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4400 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
